songs.title: This Is How We Do (Grandtheft Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
(This is how we do, this is how we do)
This is how we do
This is how we do
That's rigth
(This is how we do, this is how we do)

[Drop]
Br-bring the beat back

[Hook]
(This is how we do, this is how we do)
(This is how we do, this is how we do)
(This is how we do, this is how we do)
